mapper.insert: insert into board values( board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{image}, #{readcount}, sysdate, #{status})
mapper.select: select nickname from account where id=#{id}
select count(*) from board where category=#{category}
select * from board where boardnum=#{boardnum} and status = '0'
mapper.update: update board set readcount=readcount+1 where boardnum=#{boardnum}
update board set category=#{category}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, image=#{image} where boardnum=#{boardnum}
update board set status='1' where writer=#{writer} and boardnum=#{boardnum}
